items.content_html: The Chat App is a lightweight web application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, designed for real-time customer support chats. It features a clean interface, dark mode toggle, and seamless compatibility across devices, ensuring a user-friendly experience.
items.title: Vasu10134/chat-app: The Chat App is a lightweight web application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, designed for real-time customer support chats. It features a clean interface, dark mode toggle, and seamless compatibility across devices, ensuring a user-friendly experience.

items.content_html: The To-Do List is a simple web application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, designed to help users manage tasks efficiently. It allows users to add, edit, and delete tasks, with a dark mode toggle for a better experience. The app is lightweight and works seamlessly on all devices.
items.title: Vasu10134/to-do-list: The To-Do List is a simple web application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, designed to help users manage tasks efficiently. It allows users to add, edit, and delete tasks, with a dark mode toggle for a better experience. The app is lightweight and works seamlessly on all devices.

items.content_html: The File Management System is a lightweight web application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that helps users organize and manage their files. It provides features like uploading, viewing, and deleting files with a simple interface. The app also includes a dark mode toggle and is optimized for cross-device compatibility.
items.title: Vasu10134/file-management-system: The File Management System is a lightweight web application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that helps users organize and manage their files. It provides features like uploading, viewing, and deleting files with a simple interface. The app also includes a dark mode toggle and is optimized for cross-device compatibility.

items.content_html: The Expense Management System is a lightweight web application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that helps users track and manage their expenses. It allows users to add, edit, and delete expenses with ease through a simple and intuitive interface. The app includes a dark mode toggle and works seamlessly across all devices.
items.title: Vasu10134/expense-management-system: The Expense Management System is a lightweight web application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that helps users track and manage their expenses. It allows users to add, edit, and delete expenses with ease through a simple and intuitive interface. The app includes a dark mode toggle and works seamlessly across all devices.
